title: Wizard and the Lizard
description: FIRE BREATH! GIGANTIC WINGS! ENORMOUS SHARP CLAWS! Becoming a dragon would fulfill all of Buddy’s dreams…or so he thinks. "Wizard and the Lizard grabbed my son's attention with fun rhymes and illustrations, while imparting the wisdom that's it OK to just be yourself."- Geek Mamas BlogA heartwarming tale of Buddy the Lizard’s journey to self-acceptance taught by his silly and clever wizard friend.Buddy the lizard wishes to become a dragon fierce and strong. His best friend Wizard thinks he is perfectly perfect just the way he is, but agrees to help him transform into a dragon… Will Buddy become the dragon he yearns to be? Or will Buddy realize that he was perfectly perfect all along?Wizard and the Lizard is a magical tale with humorous rhymes and illustrations that pop!Great book for parents, librarians and teachers; reading story-time Great book to discuss self-image, self-esteem, and friendship
author: Katie Reed
